title: Sentiment_Marker
description: Classify a movie review as Positive, Negative, or Neutral and provide reasoning with supporting evidence.

label.description: Choose the overall sentiment of the review: Positive, Negative, or Neutral.

confidence.description: Provide a confidence score for the classification, as a number between 0 and 1 with two decimal places (e.g., 0.87).

explanation.description: Give a concise explanation (1-3 sentences) describing why the review was labeled with the chosen sentiment.

evident_phrases.description: List the specific phrases from the review that clearly indicate the sentiment.
